prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Drums, Synth Lead, but without Guitar.
captions:
1. Piano, Drums, and Synth Lead are the instruments featured in this song, but no Guitar.
